00118         void setVerifyDepth(int depth = 1)
00119                 {
00120                 U_TRACE(1, "USSLSocket::setVerifyDepth(%d)", depth)
00121 
00122                 U_INTERNAL_ASSERT_POINTER(ctx)
00123 
00124                 U_SYSCALL_VOID(SSL_CTX_set_verify_depth, "%p,%d", ctx, depth);
00125                 }
00126 
00131         void setVerifyCallback(verify_cb func, int mode = SSL_VERIFY_PEER_STRICT | SSL_VERIFY_CLIENT_ONCE)
00132                 {
00133                 U_TRACE(1, "USSLSocket::setVerifyCallback(%p,%d)", func, mode)
00134 
00135                 U_INTERNAL_ASSERT_POINTER(func)
00136 
00137                 U_SYSCALL_VOID(SSL_CTX_set_verify, "%p,%d,%p", ctx, mode, func);
00138                 }
00139 
00148         long getVerifyResult()
00149                 {
00150                 U_TRACE(1, "USSLSocket::getVerifyResult()")
00151 
00152                 U_INTERNAL_ASSERT_POINTER(ssl)
00153 
00154                 long result = U_SYSCALL(SSL_get_verify_result, "%p", ssl);
00155 
00156                 U_DUMP("verify_status = %S", UServices::verify_status(result))
00157 
00158                 U_RETURN(result);
00159                 }

00166         X509* getPeerCertificate()
00167                 {
00168                 U_TRACE(1, "USSLSocket::getPeerCertificate()")
00169 
00170                 X509* peer = (X509*) (ssl ? U_SYSCALL(SSL_get_peer_certificate, "%p", ssl) : 0);
00171 
00172                 U_RETURN_POINTER(peer, X509);
00173                 }

00202         virtual bool connectServer(const UString& server, int iServPort)
00203                 {
00204                 U_TRACE(0, "USSLSocket::connectServer(%.*S,%d)", U_STRING_TO_TRACE(server), iServPort)
00205 
00206                 if (UTCPSocket::connectServer(server, iServPort) &&
00207                          (active ? secureConnection(USocket::iSockDesc) : true))
00208                         {
00209                         U_RETURN(true);
00210                         }
00211 
00212                 U_RETURN(false);
00213                 }
